Aether.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Deal #yPiercing damage to ALL enemies.

Burning.DESCRIPTION: Increases incoming #yAttack damage by #b15% (min. #b1 additional damage). NL At the start of turn, lose HP equal to half the amount of [Burning] and reduce [Burning] by #b1.

Chaos.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Changes into a random orb when you play an #yAttack. Permanently retains its last form at the end of turn.

Choked.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, the target loses 1 HP.

Constricted.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of each turn.

Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play or discard this card, reduce its #yCooldown by #b1. If it is at #b0, activate this effect.

Counter-Attack.DESCRIPTION: If you fully block all enemy #yAttacks this turn (at least #b1^), gain #yVigor and apply #b1 [Vulnerable] to ALL enemies.

Cycle.DESCRIPTION: Discard a certain number of cards then draw that many cards.

Delayed Damage.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of your turn. Ignores [Artifact] if smaller than #b4.

Demon Form.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yStrength at the start of each turn.

Earth.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Gain #b2 [Thorns] the first #b3 times it is #yChanneled. It is #yEvoked after #b3 turns, dealing damage to random enemies.

Energized.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] at the start of next turn.

Envenom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b1 #yPoison.

Fetch.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card and move it to your hand.

Fire.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Applies #yBurning and damages the highest health enemy.

Flame Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal #b1 damage back.

Flight.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less #yAttack damage. Lose #b1 stack until end of turn when taking damage, the power is cancelled at #b0 stacks.

Freezing.DESCRIPTION: Reduces #yAttack damage by #b3, or by #b4 if at least #b1 [Frost] is #yChanneled. At the end of turn, reduce [Freezing] by #b1.

Imitate.DESCRIPTION: #yImitating a card creates a copy of it with #yPurge, base damage and #yBlock reduced to #b1, and [E] cost reduced by #b2.

Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: You can pay #b3 [INS] during your turn to draw #b1 card.

Invocation.DESCRIPTION: Gains #b1 charge and #yRecover #b2 [HP] each turn. When applied, and every #b3 charges, add a #yCrystallize to the top of your draw pile. At #b12 charges, obtain #pSummoning #pRitual.

Juggernaut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain #yBlock, deal damage to a random enemy.

Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per combat, across all copies of this card.

Malleable.DESCRIPTION: Upon receiving damage, gain #yBlock. #yBlock gain increases as this power is triggered. Resets at the start of turn.

Metallicize.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the start of your turn.

Motivate.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1 until played. Repeated N times.

Noxious Fumes.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, apply [Poison] to ALL enemies.

Plated Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the end of your turn. Reduced by #b1 when receiving damage.

Poison.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, lose [HP] equal to [Poison], then reduce [Poison] by #b1.

Rebound.DESCRIPTION: Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

Recover.DESCRIPTION: Gain [HP] up to the amount you had at the end of your last turn.

Reload.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards, activate this effect that many times.

Semi-Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per turn, across all copies of this card.

Slow.DESCRIPTION: For every card you have played this turn, enemy takes #b10% more damage from #yAttacks.

Special Action.DESCRIPTION: Special action available for this card. Check the card details from your deck or from the card reward screen.

Starter.DESCRIPTION: Activates if played at the start of turn (Can also activate if the first card was autoplayed).

Support Damage.DESCRIPTION: Deal #yRanged damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of each turn. Affected by damage modifiers.

Temporary HP.DESCRIPTION: Temporary HP lasts until end of combat.

Vitality.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain [THP].

~Blur.DESCRIPTION: Retain up to #b30 #yBlock until the start of your next turn.

~Delayed.DESCRIPTION: The first time this is shuffled into your draw pile, place it on the bottom half.

~Elemental.DESCRIPTION: Ignores #yThorns. Deal #b30% additional damage if the enemy has #yBlock.

~Ethereal.DESCRIPTION: #yExhausted if in hand at the end of turn.

~Haste.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, lose #yHaste and draw #b1 card.

~Innate.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in hand.

~Intangible.DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming damage and [HP] Loss by #b50%. Reduces outgoing #yAttack damage by #b50%.

~Lock-On.DESCRIPTION: Receive #b50% more damage from Orbs and #b25% from #yRanged attacks.

~Orb Core.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 orb. NL  NL Gain a bonus effect on your second Synergy each turn.

~Recast.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, play a copy of this card. The copy #yPurges and does not #yRecast.

~Retain.DESCRIPTION: Not discarded at the end of turn. NL Or, if it is an [A_Gen] Power, not reduced at the start of next turn.

~RetainOnce.DESCRIPTION: Not discarded at the end of turn.

~Steal.DESCRIPTION: You can steal up to #b50 #yGold from a boss, #b25 #yGold from an elite, or #b10 #yGold from other non-minion enemies.

~Unique.DESCRIPTION: Can be #yUpgraded any number of times. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck, additional copies will #yUpgrade this card instead.
